com.navis.framework.portal

Class PortalConsts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.PortalConsts
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiConsts, ApiConsts, ApiConsts, ApiConsts, ApiConsts, ApiConsts, EdiSchedulerConsts

    public class PortalConsts
extends java.lang.Object
    Declaration of String constants used by the framework 'portal' package. Constants declared here are used by both Business Tier and Presentation Tier objects. By declaring them here, either tier can use them without having to reference a heavy-weight class from the other tier.
